content:
In the Limano-Kupyansk direction, the invaders hold more than 100,000 soldiers. The invaders are so demoralized that the military leadership of the hostile army creates barrier detachments.

About thistoldKharkiv Ova Kharkiv Oleg Sinegubov.

According to him, from hundreds of thousands of concentrated hostile military assaultrs - almost 40 thousand. Others are providing and logistics.

“It is these 40,000 that need to be replenished, because their losses are huge. The enemy is so demoralized that the Russian military leadership in the field resorts to the practice of barrier units, ”he said.

As reported by the Armyinform, Defense Forcesare tryingTo occupy heights in the Tabayivka area.
title: In the Limano-Kupian direction, the Russians hold more than 100,000 soldiers
description: The head of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov told about it. According to him, with hundreds ...
author: Army Inform
